query:
WITH updated_model AS (
            UPDATE model
            SET published = $1
            WHERE id = $2 AND profile_id = $3
            RETURNING id, server, server_id, profile_id, published, title, summary, description, tags, license, created_at, updated_at
        )
        SELECT
            m.id,
            m.server,
            m.server_id,
            m.profile_id,
            m.published,
            m.title,
            m.summary,
            m.description,
            m.tags,
            m.license AS "license!: ModelLicense",
            m.created_at,
            m.updated_at,
            array_agg(DISTINCT f.id) AS files,
            array_agg(DISTINCT i.id) AS images
        FROM
            updated_model AS m
        LEFT JOIN
            file AS f ON m.id = f.file_for_model_id
        LEFT JOIN
            file AS i ON m.id = i.image_for_model_id
        GROUP BY
            m.id,
            m.server,
            m.server_id,
            m.profile_id,
            m.published,
            m.title,
            m.summary,
            m.description,
            m.tags,
            m.license,
            m.created_at,
            m.updated_at;
